question: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.Some people think students should study the science of food and how to prepare it. Others think that school time should be used in learning important subjects. Discuss both views and give your opinion?Give reasons for your answer, and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.You should write at least 250 words.
text: Some individuals commented that apprentices should take culinary discipline as part of their school curriculum. However, others argue that solely the most crucial topics should be taken. Personally, I regard the first view as the most relevant for students mental development owing to the fact that it is the earlier preparation for adult life. Although, it may probably be time-consuming. This essay will shed light on both sides of the view and provide evidence to prove the arguments.

On the one hand, learning food art in the early stage will prepare youngsters for the upcoming life. In others words, they will exhibit these skills in their marriages. It will undoubtedly help them to make complex dishes. For instance, steamed fish requires professional abilities to be prepared, thus, it should be trained earlier. Hence, it will enhance a couple' lifestyles. Furthermore, the couple' stability will be gauged by the quality of refection made by both.

On the other hand, teaching food techniques at schools is  time-consuming. Because of high numbers of subjects such as languages, maths and others crucial for sophomores intellectual development, allocating subjects  like local cuisines undoubtedly are a waste of time and it will provide side effects to  pupils. Let's take secondary school as an example, each semester has at least seven high demanding subjects. Therefore, increasing one more is a big burden for youngsters. As a result, young people performance could be lowered, and several of them could find it a hardship to overcome it.

In conclusion, despite the overload instilled by eating discipline themes, it is really worthy for intellectual and social life improvement . That's why I recommend ruling power insert cuisine modules in the educational system.
